title: Research Topic: ICE Masked Paramilitary Operations 2025: Constitutional Violations and Congressional Arrests
summary:
Based on the research priority 'ICE Masked Paramilitary Operations 2025: Constitutional Violations and Congressional Arrests', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document ICE shift from law enforcement to paramilitary operations targeting oversight officials:
- Masked officers using unmarked vehicles refusing to show warrants (Los Angeles, San Bernardino incid...
